page.title: 11LOCAL NEWS SUMMER 1985
page.content: JUDO CLUB LILLIESLEAF IS NOW STARTING A{JUDO {CLUB,}BECAUSE A LOT OF PEOPLE WERE GOING TO GALA TO GET TAUGHT.SO FAR THEY HAVE HAD A DISCO WITH RAFFLE WHICH RAISED Â£63.10 ALONG WITH A DONATION OF Â£40.00, AND A CONCERT WHICH RAISED Â£103.00,WITH A DONATION OF Â£20.00. PLOUGHMANS LUNCH ON SAT.27TH OF APRIL 1985,LILLIESLEAF PLAYGROUP HELD A{PLOUGHMANS LUNCH,}IN THE CURRIE MEMORIAL HALL, LILLIESLEAF. THIS WAS TO RAISE MONEY FOR CANCER RESEARCH, AND THE LILLIESLEAF UNDER FIVES.ABOUT 75 PEOPLE TURNED UP,THEY CAME FROM INSIDE A FOUR MILE RADIUS.THEY RAISED APPROX.Â£150.
